name: Jack Max Assault
description:
Jack Max is out for revenge. The street of the city have become overridden with crime. Help him shoot his way through the city streets defeat all the criminals.

Top Game Features:

--You Start with a Bonus of $500,000 is free cash
--Use the cash to upgrade your weapons
--Tanks, Trucks, Cars
--Buy a Jetpack and fly around the huge open world map
--Watch out for the Sniper on the roof
--6 Gun Types including RPG, Machine Gun, Pistol, and Shotgun
--The more money you collect, the more things you can purchase
--Awesome 3D graphics and gameplay


Mission Goals include :

--Take out the enemy swat team
--Fight the enemy bosses
--Defeat huge Battle Tanks
--Take out entire SWAT teams


All your favorite elements found in the best 3D Open World Crime Simulators plus action packed missions. Some of the missions feel impossible at first, but stick with it and you will battle your way to success. Miami loves Jack Max!

The controls take some getting used to, but be patient.

Run fast Jack Max. A $500,000 free starting bonus makes this game worth a try.
